explanation: Several opinions highlight a rejection at a key trendline and double top formation on the 1-hour chart, with traders warning against longing BTC until a decent retracement occurs. Some mention possible traps for long positions and shifting sentiment as recent price action looks bearish on short timeframes. Although some traders discuss targets above 108k, the majority of technical commentary is cautious or bearish in the immediate term.
representative_opinions: Tjeerd Phaff: my simple ta saying we broke trend line tested it and rejected
oscartg638: it was rejected at the 1min for sure
TraderX: To be careful here for those thinking of longing or who did. I felt trapping more likely than not.
Tjeerd Phaff: 1h shows double top and rejected at high average weekly range
Tjeerd Phaff: I would not long until we get a decent retracement
